AbstractScenario - Class in com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario
The abstract class for all scenarios.

AbstractStep<T> - Class in com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps
Describes a step in the BDD Hierarchy.
Hence, it contains the actual behavior.
AbstractStep(GherkinKeyword, String, T) - Constructor for class com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.AbstractStep
Creates an AbstractStep with the specified keyword, description and behavior.
AbstractSteps<T extends AbstractStep<?>> - Class in com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps
Describes multiple steps.
AbstractSteps() - Constructor for class com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.AbstractSteps

and(Steps) - Static method in class com.xceptance.testbddy.api.BddSuite
Creates a Steps instance and adds every Step of the parameter to it.

and(Steps) - Method in class com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.Steps
 
and(Steps) - Method in class com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeSteps
 
and(TypeSteps<T>) - Method in class com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario.OutlineDescriptor
Adds all steps of the specified TypeSteps to the OutlineDescriptor.steps.
Note, that the generic type of the parameter has to fit the generic type of this class.
and(TypeSteps<T>) - Method in class com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeSteps
Adds all steps of the specified TypeSteps to the steps.
Note, that the generic type of the parameter has to fit the generic type of this class.
and(String, Runnable) - Static method in class com.xceptance.testbddy.api.BddSuite
Creates a new instance of Steps which contains the Step specified with the description and runnable.
and(String, Runnable) - Method in class com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario.OutlineDescriptor
Adds the step specified by the description and runner to the OutlineDescriptor.steps.
The keyword of the TypeStep is And.
and(String, Runnable) - Method in class com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.AbstractSteps
Adds the step with the supplied description and runner to the AbstractSteps.steps.
The keyword of the Step is And.

and(String, Consumer<T>) - Method in class com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeSteps
Adds the step specified by the description and consumer to the AbstractSteps.steps.
The keyword of the TypeStep is And.
